#-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
[OBJECTS]
# type	x	y	ani_set_id	detail_type	extra_settings per object type
# type: 0 = Mario , 1 = Brick, 2 = QuestionBox, 3 = Goomba, 4 = Koopa 50 = Portal, 5 = Coin, 6 = PLANT_FIRE, 7 PLANT_NORMAL, 8 ITEM


# -- BRICK--
#Type	x	y	ani	TypeBrick
#wooden

#ground brick

#block
